channel.title: GoogleColaboratory on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in GoogleColaboratory on Some Title

item.title: Let's reproduce the math teaching tool Jamaica ❗️ vol.01 Memorandum for displaying images in Python
item.description: #Introduction This series is about Math teaching tool Jamaica It is a record struggling to achieve the following goals. ▶︎ 1. *** “Jamaica” game can be run by a program that uses image display. *** 2. *** Create a program that searches for and presents the existence of solutions and their contents for any combination of dice in Jamaica. *** Q1. What is arithmetic tool "Jamaica"? A1. “Jamaica / Jamaica” is sold as a mathematics teaching tool based on “number play" using dice.

item.title: How to use Google Colaboratory
item.description: ![image.png](https://qiita-image-store.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/0/587891/ed416201-d330-975f-0707-cea8dd90ab29.png) Purpose Google Colaboratory can be used. Please see How to use Google Colaboratory for detailed explanation and code.

item.title: Construction of environment for using CaboCha on google cola borboratory
item.description: #Introduction Language processing 100 knocks Chapter 5 of 2015: I made a lot of trouble to use CaboCha necessary for dependency analysis, so I will summarize it. About #google colabratory Mainly used as a python cloud environment, but shell commands can be used. !{Shell command} !pip install library name You can use shell commands like this. The OS you are using seems to be Ubuntu, so check it with a command
